name: Falco
description:
Since the plague spread across the world, it has turned into a wasteland. The few remaining survivors left are slowly being infected themselves and dying. When the massive plague-infested storm known as the Void reached your home, you made the decision to go out with a bang and outrun it for as long as you can.

To play, you avoid the plagued people and outrun the Void. You can save survivors by touching them.

Tip: You can double jump.

-----------------

Engine version used: 3.2
